sense.def:
A vacuum
je prostor, v katerem ni niti zraka niti nobenega drugega plina.

To create a vacuum
pomeni, da oseba ali stvar odide oziroma jo kdo prestavi z njenega položaja, ki ga mora potem zapolniti nekdo drug ali nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Rival groups would seek to fill the power vacuum that the departing British would leave.
